Package dataset

Contains the necessary classes and interface to create a dataset, consisting of attributes and classes represented by integers and also to load them from a file.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Dataset
    The Dataset is a set of Instances.
    Instance
    An Instance is a collection of values (int), each one associated to an Attribute, plus a value for the class (int)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Attribute
    An Attribute (or feature), which is represented by a label (or name) (String) is a class meant to represent features belonging to an Instance
    DatasetIterator
    Iterator for the Dataset
    DatasetLoader
    The purpose of this abstract class is to create and return an object Dataset that contains the information present in a file
    DefaultDataset
    This class implements a Dataset in which the set of instances is represented by a List and the set of Attributes by an array
    DefaultInstance
    This class implements an Instance where the association between the Attributes and its values are stored in a HashMap
